meanings.definition: The quality or state of being indomitable.
meanings.sent1: Her indomitabilities shone through as she faced every challenge with determination.
meanings.sent2: His indomitabilities inspired others to never give up in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent3: The little girl's indomitabilities were on full display as she fearlessly climbed the tree in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: In the battlefield of life, her indomitabilities were her strongest armor.
meanings.sent5: The indomitabilities of the hero were legendary, never yielding to any obstacle.

meanings.definition: The ability to resist defeat, difficulty, or failure.
meanings.sent1: The team's indomitabilities led them to victory despite all odds.
meanings.sent2: His indomitabilities were tested when he refused to give up on his dreams.
meanings.sent3: The cat's indomitabilities were evident as it repeatedly tried to catch the elusive laser pointer.
meanings.sent4: Like a mountain, his indomitabilities stood firm against the storms of life.
meanings.sent5: The indomitabilities of the oak tree allowed it to weather any storm that came its way.
